name: Ambertaffy
description: It bends but it doesn’t break. Doesn’t taste great, though.

name: Anti-poison Potion
description: Neutralizes toxins in the blood and renders them harmless. Grants temporary immunity to poison.

name: Atonement Crystal
description:
Applies bonus when leveling up a hero:
  • +35 Bonus to HP
  • +10 Bonus to MP

name: Lesser Atonement Crystal
description:
Applies bonus when leveling up a hero:
  • +15 Bonus to HP

name: Greater Atonement Crystal
description:
Applies bonus when leveling up a hero:
  • +1 to two random, mutually exclusive, stats
  • +1% to Primary Stat Growth of those same stats
  • +2% to Secondary Stat Growth of those same stats
bonusDesc: +1 to two random, mutually exclusive, stats
+1% to Primary Stat Growth of those same stats
+2% to Secondary Stat Growth of those same stats

name: DFK 1st Birthday Cake
description: Thanks for celebrating DFK's 1st birthday with us and summoning a new Hero into the realm. Enjoy this soulbound birthday cake as a literal token of our gratitude. Happy birthday DFK!

name: Anti-blinding Potion
description: Restores sight by interacting with the magical energies that cause blinding and rendering them powerless. Grants temporary immunity to blindness.

name: Bloater
description: This plump fish sells for its weight in gold...but it’s mostly hot air.

name: Bluestem
description: Beautiful leaves. Why does blue always remind you of mana?

name: Breathe Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: cJEWEL
description: Power token for voting escrow.

name: Chaos Crystal
description:
Applies the following temporary modifiers when leveling:
  • +10% to Primary Stat Growth roll for random stat
  • +30% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for random stat
bonusDesc: +10% to Primary Stat Growth roll for random stat
+30% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for random stat

name: Lesser Chaos Crystal
description:
Applies the following temporary modifiers when leveling:
  • +5% to Primary Stat Growth roll for random stat
  • +15% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for random stat
bonusDesc: +5% to Primary Stat Growth roll for random stat
+15% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for random stat

name: Greater Chaos Crystal
description:
Applies the following temporary modifiers when leveling:
  • +15% to Primary Stat Growth roll for a random stat
  • +45% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for a random stat
bonusDesc: +15% to Primary Stat Growth roll for a random stat
+45% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for a random stat

name: Chaos Stone
description:
Applies bonus to new Hero when summoning:
  • +6 bonus to a random stat
  • +5% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
  • +13% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat
bonusDesc: +5% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
+13% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat

name: Lesser Chaos Stone
description:
Applies bonus to new Hero when summoning:
  • +4 bonus to a random stat
  • +3% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
  • +5% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat
bonusDesc: +3% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
+5% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat

name: Greater Chaos Stone
description:
Applies bonus to new Hero when summoning:
  • +8 bonus to a random stat
  • +7% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
  • +21% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat
bonusDesc: +7% to Primary Stat Growth of that stat
+21% to Secondary Stat Growth of that stat

name: Courage Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: CRYSTAL
description: You find yourself subconsciously shaking this bag, just to hear the jingle and jangle.

name: Dark Hero Crystal
description: You can feel dark power seeping from this egg.

name: Darkweed
description: A root, always found in dark places, that can deliver others from darkness.

name: Defiagra
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Defiagra Plus
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Duel Season 0 Participation Trophy
description: Thanks for participating in the DFK Duel Pre-season! Enjoy this smaller-than-average trophy as a token of our appreciation. It has many uses such as... door stop, paper weight, soup bowl...

name: Energy Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Pages of the Eternal Story
description: A weathered page with strange and wondrous legends, written with exquisite penmanship.

name: Eternal Story Page One
description: A decorative page weathered with time and torn from a book, detailing the creatures who inhabit the world of Gaia.

description: A decorative page weathered with time and torn from a book, detailing the creatures who inhabit the world of Gaia.

name: Frost Bloater
description: This plump fish sells for its weight in gold...but starts to shrivel as the ice inside melts away.

name: Frost Drum
description: Squishy and round tubers that can be eaten raw or added to any dish to help fill one’s stomach.

name: Gaia’s Tears
description: A crystal that, when attuned properly, can summon heroes from faraway lands.
dfkChainDescription: * Deprecated. Requires migration to new Gaia’s Tears

name: Gaia’s Tears
description: A crystal that, when attuned properly, can summon heroes from faraway lands.

name: Gold
description: You find yourself subconsciously shaking this bag, just to hear the jingle and jangle.

name: Gold Ingot
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Raw Gold Nugget
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Gold
description: The predominant currency of the land and a prodigious greaser of hands.

name: Goldvein
description: Brings a whole new level to variegated leaves. Quite valuable.

name: Health Vial
description: First aid for the adventuring Hero. Heals minor wounds and restores some Hit Points to a Hero instantly.

name: Full Health Potion
description: Wounds magically close while broken bones and torn muscles knit together in seconds. Restores a Hero’s HP fully.

name: Hero Egg
description: You can feel power seeping from this egg.

name: Hope Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Iron Ingot
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Raw Iron Nugget
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Ironscale
description: The Knight of the Lake. Its scales are as hard as armor.

name: Jewel
description: You find yourself subconsciously shaking this bag, just to hear the jingle and jangle.

name: King Pincer
description: Hardy and large crustaceans with claws to be mindful of.

name: Knaproot
description: Roots from an amber willow that can be brewed into a cup of tea. A single whiff can put one to sleep.

name: Lanterneye
description: Known to have a connection to magic. Don’t go toward the light...

name: Moksha Rune
description: The rune pulses in your palm, the burdens on your mind witness liberation...

name: Light Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Magic Resistance Potion
description: Infuses the body with magically-resistant particles, reducing the effectiveness of magical attacks for a duration.

name: Mana Vial
description: Contains raw magical energy in a tasty liquid form. Restores some Mana to a Hero instantly.

name: Full Mana Potion
description: Magical energy courses through a Hero’s body as their Mana Points are fully restored.

name: Milkweed
description: Pure white, like its namesake. Feeder of butterflies and provider of magic resistance.

name: Might Crystal
description:
Applies the following temporary modifiers when leveling:
  • +10% to Primary Stat Growth roll for STR
  • +30% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for STR
bonusDesc: +10% to Primary Stat Growth roll for STR
+30% to Secondary Stat Growth roll for STR

name: Om Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Black Pet Egg
description: You think this egg might have been incubated too long.

name: Blue Pet Egg
description: An aquatic-looking egg.

name: Golden Pet Egg
description: Looks like real gold. Is it though?

name: Green Pet Egg
description: If you put your ear against it, you can hear a soft noise.

name: Grey Pet Egg
description: An egg that reminds you of the forest.

name: Yellow Pet Egg
description: You sense something slumbering inside.

name: Pure Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Raffle Ticket
description: A ticket that can be used for entering raffles.

name: Ragweed
description: A lousy allergen and irritant. Highly invasive. Sells for a bounty.

name: Redgill
description: Fetches a decent price in gold. A staple in Adelyn fish chowder.

name: Redleaf
description: A popular decoration, there’s a reasonable market demand for these.

name: Rock
description: You are overcome with the desire to paint some eyes on it.

name: Rockroot
description: Linked to healing. Its ability to grow in such inhospitable conditions is remarkable.

name: Sailfish
description: Its dorsal fin resembles a sail, and it’s an incredibly fast swimmer.

name: Shaggy Caps
description: Tiny clusters of fungi that adapted to the tundra.

name: Shimmerskin
description: The iridescent beauty of its scales hints at great power.

name: Shvas Rune
description: This rune pulses with power. Watching it, you begin to breathe in its rhythm...

name: Silverfin
description: High market price. Prized for its meat. Pan-sear and flavor with cinnamon.

name: Skunk Shade
description: A dark striped plant with a malodorous musk.

name: Soul Rune
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Speckle Tail
description: A common fish with rainbow patterns and speckles.

name: Spiderfruit
description: Might look like poison, but it can actually save you from it.

name: Stamina Vial
description: A quick pick-me-up in a convenient, single-serving bottle. Energizes a Hero, restoring 25 Stamina instantaneously.

name: Stamina Pot
description: Restores a good amount of stamina.

name: Chiseled Stone Block
description: A truly astounding item.

name: Swiftness Potion
description: Time itself seems to stretch and slow as reaction time is enhanced. Increases a Hero’s agility temporarily.

name: Swift-Thistle
description: The purple flowers are known to enhance speed when used correctly, hence the name.

name: Three Eyed Eel
description: An eel whose gelatinous eyes can be used in various concoctions.

name: Toughness Potion
description: Hardens skin and strengthens bone. Increases a Hero’s defense against physical damage for a period of time.
